title: Bug 6304 - Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the operation fails without providing any error message or indication of the issue.
EB: Expect the synchronization process to successfully update both the .java file and the associated resource, ensuring consistency between them.
SR:
1. Open the IDE and navigate to the project containing a .java file and an associated resource.
2. Right-click on the .java file and choose the 'Synchronize' option.
3. Observe the synchronization process and check if both the .java file and the associated resource are updated correctly. Ensure there are no errors or failures during the synchronization.
